item.title: Report X-2025030063
item.description:
Report X-2025030063

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-02
  • City: MIAMI
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF Freight
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A forklift operator was lowering a pallet of freight that he had lifted off another pallet. While placing the pallet, the tip of the forklift blade struck a pail causing a small puncture resulting in a small release to the dock floor. The team at 221 placed absorbents on the spill and CURA was conta cted for remediation.
